sentence: It's difficult to ______ without enough information.
sentence_translation: 没有足够的信息，很难做出决定。

sentence: She ______ reading every day to improve her vocabulary.
sentence_translation: 她每天花两个小时阅读以提高词汇量。

sentence: Watching too much TV is ______ when you have homework to do.
sentence_translation: 当你有作业要做时，看太多电视是浪费时间。

sentence: He ______ his classmates, so he always feels happy at school.
sentence_translation: 他与同学们关系很好，所以他在学校总是感到快乐。

sentence: We should ______ instead of being afraid of making them.
sentence_translation: 我们应该从错误中学习，而不是害怕犯错。

sentence: Joining a public speaking club can help ______.
sentence_translation: 加入一个公共演讲俱乐部可以帮助提高沟通能力。

sentence: It's important to ______ while studying to get better results.

sentence: As a team leader, she ______ assigning tasks to each member.
sentence_translation: 作为团队负责人，她负责给每个成员分配任务。

sentence: Doing exercise is a good way to ______ from work.
sentence_translation: 做运动是应对工作压力的好方法。

sentence: He can ______ others because he is always kind and patient.
sentence_translation: 他能与他人相处融洽，因为他总是善良和有耐心。

sentence: ______ of reading in the morning can make you more knowledgeable.
sentence_translation: 养成早上阅读的习惯可以让你更有知识。

sentence: She ______ by cooking at home instead of eating out every day.
sentence_translation: 她通过在家做饭而不是每天外出就餐来省钱。

sentence: He ______ books because he loves reading.
sentence_translation: 他在书上花了很多钱，因为他喜欢阅读。

sentence: Joining a sports team is a great way to ______.
sentence_translation: 加入运动队是结交新朋友的好方法。

sentence: We should ______ bravely instead of running away from them.
sentence_translation: 我们应该勇敢面对挑战，而不是逃避它们。

sentence: She ______ to learn 50 new English words every week.
sentence_translation: 她设定了每周学习50个新英语单词的目标。

sentence: Success can be ______ through hard work and determination.
sentence_translation: 成功可以通过努力和决心来取得。

sentence: Doing part-time jobs can help students ______ before graduation.

sentence: Traveling to different countries allows you to ______ about various cultures.
sentence_translation: 去不同的国家旅行可以让你了解不同文化的新事物。

sentence: If you feel tired, ______ and have a cup of coffee.
sentence_translation: 如果你感到累了，休息一下，喝杯咖啡。

sentence: Turn off your phone to ______ without distractions.
sentence_translation: 关掉手机，专心学习，不受干扰。

sentence: He ______ so much that he forgot to have lunch.
sentence_translation: 他太专心工作了，以至于忘了吃午饭。

sentence: She ______ to pursue her hobby of playing the guitar.
sentence_translation: 她加入了音乐社团，追求她弹吉他的爱好。

sentence: Students are encouraged to ______ various activities after school.
sentence_translation: 鼓励学生参加各种课后活动。

sentence: It's important to ______ to avoid getting too stressed.
sentence_translation: 平衡学习和生活很重要，以避免压力过大。

sentence: Listening to music is a good way to ______ and relax.
sentence_translation: 听音乐是减压和放松的好方法。

sentence: Taking short breaks can actually ______ at work.

sentence: Living off campus gives students ______ to manage their time.
sentence_translation: 校外住宿让学生有更多自由支配时间。

sentence: She ______ after taking a warm bath and listening to soft music.
sentence_translation: 洗完热水澡听着轻柔的音乐，她感到很放松。

sentence: Winning the competition helped her ______ a lot.

sentence: Everyone should be able to ______ freely in a democratic discussion.

sentence: Using a to-do list can help you ______ and finish tasks on time.
sentence_translation: 使用待办事项清单可以帮助你高效工作并按时完成任务。

sentence: He always ______ no matter how busy he is.
sentence_translation: 无论他多忙，他总是能按时完成任务。

sentence: To ______, you need to manage your time effectively.

sentence: We can ______' experiences to avoid making the same mistakes.

sentence: Don't just focus on the result, ______ of learning something new.
sentence_translation: 不要只关注结果，享受学习新事物的过程。

sentence: ______ during holidays is very important to her.

sentence: ______ every day is good for both physical and mental health.
sentence_translation: 每天做些运动对身心健康都有好处。

sentence: They often ______ in the park after dinner.
sentence_translation: 他们晚饭后经常去公园散步。

sentence: Eating well, exercising regularly, and sleeping enough help ______.
sentence_translation: 饮食良好、定期锻炼和充足睡眠有助于保持健康的生活方式。

sentence: ______ can improve your energy and overall well-being.
sentence_translation: 吃健康的食物可以提高你的精力，改善整体健康状况。

sentence: It's hard to focus in class if you don't ______ at night.
sentence_translation: 如果你晚上睡眠不足，很难在课堂上集中注意力。

sentence: ______ gives you the flexibility to learn at your own pace.

sentence: She prefers to ______ because it's quiet and comfortable.

sentence_translation: 住在校园里方便上课和参加校园活动。

sentence_translation: 一些学生选择住在校外，以获得更多的隐私和空间。

sentence_translation: 与朋友共度美好时光可以增进你们的关系。

sentence: ______ can help you organize your day and use time wisely.

sentence: I ______ reading books to watching TV in my free time.

sentence: Students in this school ______ excellent educational resources.

sentence: You can ______ in English by practicing every day.

sentence: It's a great feeling to ______ and achieve your goal.

sentence: Find a quiet place to study to ______ from noise and people.
sentence_translation: 找一个安静的地方学习，以避免噪音和人群的干扰。

sentence: He ______, so he needs a quiet environment to work.
sentence_translation: 他很容易分心，所以他需要一个安静的环境来工作。

sentence: ______ can bring different ideas and perspectives to a project.
sentence_translation: 团队合作可以为项目带来不同的想法和视角。

sentence: Scientists often ______ from different countries on research projects.
sentence_translation: 科学家们经常与来自不同国家的同行合作进行研究项目。

sentence: ______ with classmates can help you understand the lesson better.

sentence: It's normal to ______ in a group discussion.
sentence_translation: 在小组讨论中意见不同是正常的。

sentence: ______'s opinions is important in any relationship.
sentence_translation: 在任何关系中，尊重彼此的意见都很重要。

sentence: She ______ playing the piano because it makes her happy and relaxed.
sentence_translation: 她喜欢弹钢琴，因为它让她感到快乐和放松。

sentence: He ______ environmental protection and volunteers for green projects.
sentence_translation: 他对环境保护充满热情，并为绿色项目做志愿者。

sentence: As an adult, you need to ______ for your actions and decisions.

sentence: ______ is important to maintain order in school and society.

sentence: Dressing appropriately and being polite can help you ______.
sentence_translation: 着装得体和礼貌可以帮助你留下好印象。

sentence: Many writers ______ the beauty of nature and daily life.

sentence: Before solving a problem, you need to ______ carefully to find the root cause.

sentence: Brainstorming with others can help you ______ new and creative ideas.

sentence: She ______ her son for winning the science competition.

sentence_translation: 利用网上可用的免费资源来提高你的语言能力。

sentence: He ______ history and spends a lot of time reading historical books.
sentence_translation: 他对历史感兴趣，花很多时间阅读历史书籍。

sentence: She ______ painting and has won several awards for her artwork.
sentence_translation: 她擅长绘画，并因她的艺术作品获得了多个奖项。

sentence: Many students ______ time management when they first go to college.

sentence: Don't worry too much about the future; just ______ and have fun.

sentence: Traveling to different places is a great way to ______ about the world.

sentence: ______ of exercising in the morning can benefit your health in the long run.

sentence: It's not easy to ______, but it's possible with patience and determination.
sentence_translation: 改掉坏习惯不容易，但只要有耐心和决心就能做到。

sentence: ______ can help you stay focused and motivated to achieve it.

sentence: Small actions can ______ in protecting the environment.

sentence: ______ allows you to accept new ideas and learn from others.
sentence_translation: 思想开明让你能够接受新想法并向他人学习。

sentence: Different people have different ways to ______ in their lives.

sentence_translation: 在团队中信任他人对于有效协作很重要。

sentence_translation: 成功的关键是不断进步，永不放弃。

sentence: ______ is the first step to achieving anything you want in life.
